Title: Initiates a four-year moratorium on privatization voting by Mitchell-Lama building shareholders
Summary: Initiates a four year moratorium on privatization voting by Mitchell-Lama building shareholders between failed dissolution votes.
LawCode: Amd ยง35, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to initiating a four-year moratorium on privatization voting by Mitchell-Lama building shareholders
